use.flag: Enable the scripts for music sharing through DAAP. This flag adds dependencies on www-servers/mongrel to allow sharing of the Amarok music collection through DAAP protocol. Please note that turning this flag off has no effect on DAAP browsing.
Use libmysqld, MySQL embedded server library. Try disabling this if you encounter -PIC related in amarok, it will make amarok rely only on standalone MySQL server.
Enable Last.fm streaming services support through media-libs/liblastfm
